column4: MrBarkyVonSchnauz: I do not get your humor about changing font colors.
do you mean for the command line, or the fonts in your desktop environment?
so there is no way to change the color of the text at the bottom panel (that shows the open programs)?
there should be some gnome display preferences somewhere where you can set that(assuming you are running gnome).  I am in XFCE right now, so I can't really look to tell you
